availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bracken County shoemaker. Native of Germany. Married to Gertrut (Catherine) Dinzler on April 30, 1860. Father of Emma Stoll and Lewie Stoll. Shoemaker in Bracken County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Brooksville, p. 2.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 9.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Brooksville, p. 16.
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Film #000851644, Bracken County, April 30, 1860 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
